name: elegasilk-backend
description: The backend API for "ElegaSilk" will serve as the cornerstone of the e-commerce platform, enabling seamless product management, order processing, and customer relations. Designed with Node.js and Express, the API will provide robust endpoints for handling the CRUD operations of saree listings, managing user authentication, and facilitating secure checkout processes. The MongoDB database integration ensures scalable data storage and quick retrieval, fostering a responsive user experience. This backend system is engineered to support real-time inventory updates, comprehensive analytics, and a modular approach to accommodate future expansions, such as integrating AI for personalized recommendations, thus laying a solid foundation for "ElegaSilk" to become a leading name in luxury saree retail.
author: Rhythm Saha
